org.youscope.plugin.controller

Interface ControllerJob

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Component, Job, JobContainer, java.rmi.Remote, TableProducer

    public interface ControllerJob
extends Job, JobContainer, TableProducer
    Job which implements a controller, consisting of an input, a control algorithm and an output.
    Author:
    Moritz Lang

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getControllerScripScript()
      Returns the script of the controller which gets evaluated by the script engine.
      java.lang.String getControllerScriptEngine()
      Returns the name of the script engine, or null, if script engine is not set.
      Job getInputJob()
      Returns the job which is used to produce the input for the controller.
      Job getOutputJob()
      Returns the job which is used to consume the output of the controller.
      void setControllerScript(java.lang.String controllerScript)
      Sets the script for the controller which gets evaluated by the script engine.
      void setControllerScriptEngine(java.lang.String engine)
      Sets the script engine with which the scripts should be evaluated.
      void setInputJob(Job inputJob)
      Sets the job which should be used to create the table data used as input for the controller.
      void setOutputJob(Job outputJob)
      Sets the job which should be used to consume the output from the controller.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.youscope.common.Component

      • Methods inherited from interface org.youscope.common.table.TableProducer

        addTableListener, getProducedTableDefinition, removeTableListener

      • setControllerScriptEngine

        void setControllerScriptEngine(java.lang.String engine)
                        throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                               MeasurementRunningException
        Sets the script engine with which the scripts should be evaluated.
        Parameters:
        engine - The script engine to use.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
        MeasurementRunningException

      • getControllerScriptEngine

        java.lang.String getControllerScriptEngine()
                                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Returns the name of the script engine, or null, if script engine is not set.
        Returns:
        Script engine factory name.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException,

        Sets the script for the controller which gets evaluated by the script engine.
        Parameters:
        controllerScript - Controller script to evaluate.
        Throws:

      • getControllerScripScript

        java.lang.String getControllerScripScript()
                                   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Returns the script of the controller which gets evaluated by the script engine.
        Returns:
        Script of the controller.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • getInputJob

        Job getInputJob()
         throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Returns the job which is used to produce the input for the controller. It is guaranteed that this job implements the TableDataProducer interface.
        Returns:
        Table data producing used as input, or null.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • setInputJob

        void setInputJob(Job inputJob)
          throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                 MeasurementRunningException,
                 java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                 java.lang.NullPointerException
        Sets the job which should be used to create the table data used as input for the controller. The job must implement the TableProducer. If this is not given, an IllegalArgumentException will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        inputJob - Table producing job for control algorithm.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
        MeasurementRunningException
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If inputJob does not implement TableProducer.
        java.lang.NullPointerException - Thrown if inputJob is null.

      • getOutputJob

        Job getOutputJob()
          throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Returns the job which is used to consume the output of the controller. It is guaranteed that this job implements the OutputConsumer interface.
        Returns:
        Output consumer job, or null if yet not set.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • setOutputJob

        void setOutputJob(Job outputJob)
           throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                  MeasurementRunningException,
                  java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                  java.lang.NullPointerException
        Sets the job which should be used to consume the output from the controller. The job must implement the TableProducer. If this is not given, an IllegalArgumentException will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        outputJob - output consumer job.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
        MeasurementRunningException
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If outputJob does not implement TableConsumer.
        java.lang.NullPointerException - Thrown if outputJob is null,
